use oxemarine_ldw
GO

-- TYPE 'table' is not supported.

CREATE TABLE #fclive_ymd
(   PKid int,
    device varchar(20),
    year varchar(4),
    month varchar(2),
    day varchar(2)
)

insert into #fclive_ymd EXEC silver.usp_get_fclive_ymd

select * from #fclive_ymd

declare @device varchar(20), @year varchar(4), @month varchar(2), @day varchar(2),
        @max int=(select max(PKid) from #fclive_ymd),
        @w int=1

while @w <= @max
BEGIN
        select @device=device, @year=year, @month=month, @day=day from #device_ymd where PKid=@w

        EXEC silver.usp_silver_fclive @device,@year,@month,@day

        set @w=@w+1

END

/*
select * from silver.vw_device
where device='50B8FE41' and year=2022 and month=11 and day=07
order by timestamp
*/

use oxemarine_ldw
GO

-- TYPE 'table' is not supported.

CREATE TABLE #device_ymd
(   PKid int,
    device varchar(20),
    year varchar(4),
    month varchar(2),
    day varchar(2)
)

insert into #device_ymd EXEC silver.usp_get_device_ymd

select * from #device_ymd

declare @device varchar(20), @year varchar(4), @month varchar(2), @day varchar(2),
        @max int=(select max(PKid) from #device_ymd),
        @w int=1

while @w <= @max
BEGIN
        select @device=device, @year=year, @month=month, @day=day from #device_ymd where PKid=@w

        EXEC silver.usp_silver_device @device,@year,@month,@day

        set @w=@w+1

END

/*
select * from silver.vw_device
where device='50B8FE41' and year=2022 and month=11 and day=07
order by timestamp
*/

use oxemarine_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_FuelRate
GO
-- create view for device views
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_FuelRate
AS

SELECT
	[timestamp]
	,[Date]				= convert(date,[timestamp])
	,[Time]					= convert(time,timestamp)
	--,[TimeStamp]			= cast(convert(date,left([timestamp],10)) as datetime) + cast(convert(time,left(right([timestamp],16),8)) as datetime)
	,[Year]					= datepart(year,timestamp)
	,[Month]				= datepart(month,timestamp)
	,[Day]					= datepart(day,timestamp) 
	,[Hour]					= datepart(hour,timestamp)
	,[Minute]				= datepart(minute,timestamp) 
	,[Second]				= datepart(second,timestamp)
	,[GallonPerHour]		= isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375 --https://www.xconvert.com/unit-converter/cubic-meters-per-hour-to-gallons-per-hour
	,[TotalGallons]			= ((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) / 60) * 5 --Get per second, and only have data every 5th second
	,[DolloarGallons]		= (((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) / 60) * 5) * 4.5 --https://www.eia.gov/petroleum/gasdiesel/
	,[Co2Kg]				= (isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) * 10.19 --https://www.epa.gov/energy/greenhouse-gases-equivalencies-calculator-calculations-and-references
	,[PetrolGallonPerHour]	= (isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) * 1.5  --Just quessing, still need info from Oxe
	,[TotalPetrolGallons]	= (((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) / 60) * 5) * 1.5 --Get per second, and only have data every 5th second
	,[DollarPetrolGallons]	= (((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) / 60) * 5) * 1.5  --[TotalPetrolGallons] * Petrol Price per gallon
	,[PetrolCo2Kg]			= ((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) * 1.5) * 8.887 --https://www.epa.gov/energy/greenhouse-gases-equivalencies-calculator-calculations-and-references
	,[DollarSavings]		= ((((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) / 60) * 5) * 1.5) - (((([FuelRateAverage] * 264.17205234375) / 60) * 5) * 4.5)   --[DollarPetrolGallons] - [DolloarGallons]
	,[Co2Savings]			= (((isnull([FuelRateAverage],0) * 264.17205234375) * 1.5) * 8.887) - (([FuelRateAverage] * 264.17205234375) * 10.19)  --[PetrolCo2Kg] - [Co2Kg]
	
	,[EngineNumber]			=	EngineInstance
    , EngineSerialnumber
    --CASE [EngineSerialnumber]
	--WHEN '3000184' THEN 1
	--WHEN '3000206' THEN 2
	--ELSE 0
	--END
	
FROM
	silver.vw_device
where device='D994BF29' --and year=2023 and month=02 and day=12
AND
	EngineInstance > 0
--order by timestamp


-- select * from silver.vw_FuelRate order by timestamp

use oxemarine_ldw
GO

select a.device
        ,b.location
        ,b.vessel
        ,a.date_key
        ,c.day_name
        ,a.metric_count
FROM (
    select device   
            , date_key
            , count(1) as metric_count
    FROM
        silver.vw_device
    where date_key > 20230520
    group by device   
            , date_key
) a 
LEFT JOIN silver.devicedetail b
    on a.device = b.serialnumber
LEFT JOIN silver.calendar c
    on a.date_key = c.date_key
Order by date_key desc, device


select a.Device, Date_key, a.a.timestamp,a.LampStatus,SPN,a.FMI, a.Engineinstance 
from silver.vw_fclive a
order by device,timestamp

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_device
@device varchar(10),
@year varchar(4),
@month varchar(2),
@day varchar(2)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt nvarchar(max),
            @drop_sql_stmt   nvarchar(max),
            @UniqueNumber    varchar(20) = (select cast(CONVERT (TIME, SYSDATETIME()) as varchar(20)))

            set @UniqueNumber = replace(replace(@UniqueNumber,':','_'),'.','_')

    set @create_sql_stmt =
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day + '_' + @UniqueNumber +
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
                LOCATION = ''silver/DEVICE/Device=' + @device + '/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + '/day=' + @day + '/' + @UniqueNumber + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
            )
        AS
        
        
        SELECT
    device,
    year,
    month,
    day,
    [timestamp]
--ActualPressure
      ,[PressureSource]
      ,[AtmosphericPressure]
      ,[FuelRailPressure]
--ActuatorCommand
      ,[GearCommand]      
      ,[ThrottleCommand]  
--CogSogRapidUpdate      
      ,[CourseOverGround]   
      ,[CourseOverGround_deg] 
      ,[SpeedOverGround]    
      ,[SpeedOverGround_kn]
--EngineParametersDynamic      
      ,[EngineInstance]     = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then 1
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then 2
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then 3
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then 4
                              else null
                              end
      ,[EngineOilPressure]  = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then [EngineOilPressure0]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then [EngineOilPressure1]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then [EngineOilPressure2]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then [EngineOilPressure3]
                              else null
                              end
      ,[EngineOilTemp]     
      ,[EngineCoolantTemp] 
      ,[BatteryVoltage]    
      ,[FuelRate]          
      ,[TotalEngineHours]   
      ,[EngineLoad]         
--EngineParametersRapid
      ,[EngineSpeed]
      ,[BoostPressure]
      ,[PttTrim]
--OxeProprietary1 
      ,[ActualClutchSlip]
      ,[ControlheadPosition]
      ,[PropellerSpeed]
      ,[RequestClutchSlip]
--OxeProprietary4
      ,[GpcState]
      ,[GpcDuty]
      ,[GpcModuleFaults]
--PcmFeedback
      ,[PortCylinderPosition]
      ,[StbdCylinderPosition]
--PositionRapidUpdate
      ,[Latitude]       
      ,[Longitude]     
--ProductInformation     
      ,[EngineModel]     =  case   when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''OXE300''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''OXE300''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''OXE300''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''OXE300''
                              else ''OXE PV780''
                              end
      ,[EngineSwVersion]  = case   when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''SWFL-000029B8-023.013.000''
                              else ''02.09.23019''
                              end  
      ,[EngineFwVersion] = case    when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''30022124-0050001-22132''
                              else ''02.09.23019''
                              end
      ,[EngineSerialnumber] = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then ''3000206''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then ''3000184''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then ''3000206''
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then ''3000206''
                              else ''27''
                              end
--TemperatureExtendedRange
      ,[TemperatureSource]
      ,[EngineRoomTemp]
      ,[ExhaustGasTemp]
      ,[IntakeManifoldTemp]
      ,[FuelTemp]
      ,[EcuTemp]
      ,[CompressorOutTemp]
--TransmissionParametersDynamic
      ,[GearboxOilPressure]
      ,[GearboxGear]
      ,[GearboxOilTemp]
--TripParametersEngine    
      ,[FuelUsed]          
      ,[FuelRateAverage]    

        FROM bronze.vw_device
        WHERE   device = ''' + @device + '''
            AND year   = ''' + @year   + '''
            AND month  = ''' + @month  + '''
            AND day    = ''' + @day    + '''' ;

    --print(@create_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt

    SET @drop_sql_stmt =
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day  + '_' + @UniqueNumber;

    --print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt


END;

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_fclive
@device varchar(10),
@year varchar(4),
@month varchar(2),
@day varchar(2)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt nvarchar(max),
            @drop_sql_stmt   nvarchar(max),
            @UniqueNumber    varchar(20) = (select cast(CONVERT (TIME, SYSDATETIME()) as varchar(20)))

            set @UniqueNumber = replace(replace(@UniqueNumber,':','_'),'.','_')

    set @create_sql_stmt =
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fclive_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day + '_' + @UniqueNumber +
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
                LOCATION = ''silver/fclive/Device=' + @device + '/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + '/day=' + @day + '/' + @UniqueNumber + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
            )
        AS
        
        
        SELECT
    device,
    year,
    month,
    day,
    [timestamp],
    hexcode,
    LampStatus,
    SPN,
    FMI,
    enginenumber
  

        FROM bronze.vw_fclive
        WHERE   device = ''' + @device + '''
            AND year   = ''' + @year   + '''
            AND month  = ''' + @month  + '''
            AND day    = ''' + @day    + '''' ;

    --print(@create_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt

    SET @drop_sql_stmt =
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fclive_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day  + '_' + @UniqueNumber;

    --print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt


END;

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_get_device_ymd
AS
BEGIN
    select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS PKid,
            device,year,month,day 
    from bronze.vw_device
    group by device,year,month,day
    order by 1,2,3,4

END;

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_get_fclive_ymd
AS
BEGIN
    select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS PKid,
            device,year,month,day 
    from bronze.vw_fclive
    group by device,year,month,day
    order by 1,2,3,4

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_load_fclive_parquet
AS
BEGIN

CREATE TABLE #fclive_ymd
(   PKid int,
    device varchar(20),
    year varchar(4),
    month varchar(2),
    day varchar(2)
)

insert into #fclive_ymd EXEC silver.usp_get_fclive_ymd

select * from #fclive_ymd

declare @device varchar(20), @year varchar(4), @month varchar(2), @day varchar(2),
        @max int=(select max(PKid) from #fclive_ymd),
        @w int=1

while @w <= @max
BEGIN
        select @device=device, @year=year, @month=month, @day=day from #fclive_ymd where PKid=@w

        EXEC silver.usp_silver_fclive @device,@year,@month,@day

        set @w=@w+1

END

END

GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_load_parquet
AS
BEGIN

CREATE TABLE #device_ymd
(   PKid int,
    device varchar(20),
    year varchar(4),
    month varchar(2),
    day varchar(2)
)

insert into #device_ymd EXEC silver.usp_get_device_ymd

select * from #device_ymd

declare @device varchar(20), @year varchar(4), @month varchar(2), @day varchar(2),
        @max int=(select max(PKid) from #device_ymd),
        @w int=1

while @w <= @max
BEGIN
        select @device=device, @year=year, @month=month, @day=day from #device_ymd where PKid=@w

        EXEC silver.usp_silver_device @device,@year,@month,@day

        set @w=@w+1

END

END

AS
    SELECT
    dev.filepath(1) as device,
    dev.filepath(2) as year,
    dev.filepath(3) as month,
    dev.filepath(4) as day,
    dev.[timestamp],

        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',

    )
    WITH (
        timestamp datetime2(0) 1,
        ID varchar(20),
        LampStatus int,
        SPN int,
        FMI int,
        SA  float

    ) AS [dev]

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_device
AS
    SELECT
    dev.filepath(1) as device,
    dev.filepath(2) as year,
    dev.filepath(3) as month,
    dev.filepath(4) as day,
    dev.[timestamp]
--ActualPressure
      ,dev.[PressureSource]
      ,dev.[AtmosphericPressure]
      ,dev.[FuelRailPressure]
--ActuatorCommand
      ,dev.[GearCommand]      
      ,dev.[ThrottleCommand]  
--CogSogRapidUpdate      
      ,dev.[CourseOverGround]   
      ,dev.[CourseOverGround_deg] 
      ,dev.[SpeedOverGround]    
      ,dev.[SpeedOverGround_kn]
--EngineParametersDynamic      
      ,dev.[EngineOilPressure0]  
      ,dev.[EngineOilTemp]     
      ,dev.[EngineCoolantTemp] 
      ,dev.[BatteryVoltage]    
      ,dev.[FuelRate]          
      ,dev.[TotalEngineHours]   
      ,dev.[EngineLoad]         
      ,dev.[EngineOilPressure1]  
      ,dev.[EngineOilPressure2]  
      ,dev.[EngineOilPressure3] 
--EngineParametersRapid
      ,dev.[EngineSpeed]
      ,dev.[BoostPressure]
      ,dev.[PttTrim]
--OxeProprietary1 
      ,dev.[ActualClutchSlip]
      ,dev.[ControlheadPosition]
      ,dev.[PropellerSpeed]
      ,dev.[RequestClutchSlip]
--OxeProprietary4
      ,dev.[GpcState]
      ,dev.[GpcDuty]
      ,dev.[GpcModuleFaults]
--PcmFeedback
      ,dev.[PortCylinderPosition]
      ,dev.[StbdCylinderPosition]
--PositionRapidUpdate
      ,dev.[Latitude] 
      ,dev.[Longitude]
--ProductInformation     
      ,[EngineModel]        = replace(replace(replace(dev.[EngineModel],'\x00',''),CHAR(0),''),CHAR(1),'')
      ,[EngineSwVersion]    = replace(replace(replace(dev.[EngineSwVersion],'\x00',''),CHAR(0),''),CHAR(1),'')  
      ,[EngineFwVersion]    = replace(replace(replace(dev.[EngineFwVersion],'\x00',''),CHAR(0),''),CHAR(1),'')      
      ,[EngineSerialnumber] = replace(replace(replace(dev.[EngineSerialnumber],'\x00',''),CHAR(0),''),CHAR(1),'')
--TemperatureExtendedRange
      ,dev.[TemperatureSource]
      ,dev.[EngineRoomTemp]
      ,dev.[ExhaustGasTemp]
      ,dev.[IntakeManifoldTemp]
      ,dev.[FuelTemp]
      ,dev.[EcuTemp]
      ,dev.[CompressorOutTemp]
--TransmissionParametersDynamic
      ,dev.[GearboxOilPressure]
      ,dev.[GearboxGear]
      ,dev.[GearboxOilTemp]
--TripParametersEngine    
      ,dev.[FuelUsed]          
      ,dev.[FuelRateAverage]    
         
 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/textdata/DEVICE/Device=*/year=*/month=*/day=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'oxemarine_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )
    WITH (
        timestamp datetime2(0) 1,
--ActualPressure        
        PressureSource float 2,
        AtmosphericPressure FLOAT 3,
        FuelRailPressure FLOAT 4,
--ActuatorCommand
      GearCommand  float 5, 
      ThrottleCommand float 6, 
--CogSogRapidUpdate      
      CourseOverGround  float 7,
      CourseOverGround_deg float 8,   
      SpeedOverGround float 9,
      SpeedOverGround_kn float 10,
--EngineParametersDynamic      
      EngineOilPressure0 float 11,
      EngineOilTemp float 12,
      EngineCoolantTemp float 13,
      BatteryVoltage float 14,
      FuelRate float 15,
      TotalEngineHours FLOAT 16,
      EngineLoad FLOAT 17,  
      EngineOilPressure1 float 18,
      EngineOilPressure2 float 19,
      EngineOilPressure3 float 20,
   
--EngineParametersRapid
      EngineSpeed float 21,
      BoostPressure float 22,
      PttTrim float 23,
--OxeProprietary1 
      ActualClutchSlip float 24,
      ControlheadPosition float 25,
      PropellerSpeed float 26,
      RequestClutchSlip float 27,
--OxeProprietary4
      GpcState float 28,
      GpcDuty float 29,
      GpcModuleFaults float 30,
--PcmFeedback
      PortCylinderPosition float 31,   
      StbdCylinderPosition float 32, 
--PositionRapidUpdate
      Latitude float 33,
      Longitude float 34,
--ProductInformation     
      EngineModel varchar(500)   35,
      EngineSwVersion varchar(100)   36,
      EngineFwVersion varchar(100)   37,
      EngineSerialnumber varchar(100)   38,
--TemperatureExtendedRange
      TemperatureSource float 39,

      ExhaustGasTemp FLOAT 41,
	IntakeManifoldTemp FLOAT 42,
      FuelTemp FLOAT 43,
	EcuTemp FLOAT 44,
      CompressorOutTemp FLOAT 45,
--TransmissionParametersDynamic
      GearboxOilPressure float 46,
      GearboxGear float 47,
      GearboxOilTemp float 48,
--TripParametersEngine

      FuelRateAverage float 50

    ) AS [dev]

-- create view for device views
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_fclive
AS
    SELECT DISTINCT
    dev.filepath(1) as device,
    dev.filepath(2) as year,
    dev.filepath(3) as month,
    dev.filepath(4) as day,
    date_key = convert(int, convert(varchar(10), timestamp, 112)) ,
    dev.timestamp,
    --dev.hexcode,
    LampStatusValue = dev.LampStatus,
    LampStatus = CASE WHEN dev.LampStatus in (4,8,12) THEN 'Amber' 
                      WHEN dev.LampStatus  in (16,32,48) THEN 'Red'
                      ELSE 'Other' END,
    dev.SPN,
    dev.FMI,
    EngineInstance = dev.enginenumber


FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/silver/fclive/Device=*/year=*/month=*/day=*/*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'oxemarine_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
    WITH (
        timestamp datetime2(0) ,
        hexcode varchar(20),
        LampStatus int,
        SPN int,
        FMI int,
        enginenumber  int
   
    ) AS [dev]
GO

            AND year   = '2023'

            AND EngineModel is not NULL

            AND EngineFwVersion is not NULL
            AND EngineSerialnumber is not null
) a
*/

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_device
@device varchar(10),
@year varchar(4),
@month varchar(2),
@day varchar(2)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt nvarchar(max),
            @create_sql_stmt_2 nvarchar(max),   -- overcome len limit of 2000
            @drop_sql_stmt   nvarchar(max),
            @UniqueNumber    varchar(20) = (select cast(CONVERT (TIME, SYSDATETIME()) as varchar(20)))

            set @UniqueNumber = replace(replace(@UniqueNumber,':','_'),'.','_')

    set @create_sql_stmt =
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day + '_' + @UniqueNumber +
        ' WITH
            (
                DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
                LOCATION = ''silver/DEVICE/Device=' + @device + '/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + '/day=' + @day + '/' + @UniqueNumber + ''',
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
            )
        AS

       with getModel as (
             select device, EngineInstance, EngineModel,EngineSwVersion, EngineFwVersion, EngineSerialnumber,
                best_row = row_number() over (Partition by device,EngineInstance, EngineModel order by tot_Len desc)
                  from (
                  select distinct device,
                              [EngineInstance]     = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then 1
                                                when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then 2
                                                when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then 3
                                                when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then 4
                                                else -1
                                                end, 
                              EngineModel,EngineSwVersion, EngineFwVersion, EngineSerialnumber,
                              tot_Len = len(EngineSwVersion) + len(EngineFwVersion) + len(EngineSerialnumber)

                  FROM bronze.vw_device
                        WHERE   device = ''' + @device + '''
                              AND year   = ''' + @year   + '''
                              AND month  = ''' + @month  + '''
                              AND day    = ''' + @day    + '''
                              AND EngineModel is not NULL
                              AND EngineSwVersion is not NULL
                              AND EngineFwVersion is not NULL
                              AND EngineSerialnumber is not null
                  ) a
       ) 
        
        SELECT
    v.device,
    v.year,
    v.month,
    v.day,
    [timestamp]

      ,[PressureSource]
      ,[AtmosphericPressure]
      ,[FuelRailPressure]

      ,[GearCommand]      
      ,[ThrottleCommand]  
     
      ,[CourseOverGround]   
      ,[CourseOverGround_deg] 
      ,[SpeedOverGround]    
      ,[SpeedOverGround_kn]
      
      ,[EngineInstance]     =  g.EngineInstance
      ,[EngineOilPressure]  = case when [EngineOilPressure0] is not null then [EngineOilPressure0]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure1] is not null then [EngineOilPressure1]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure2] is not null then [EngineOilPressure2]
                                   when [EngineOilPressure3] is not null then [EngineOilPressure3]
                              else null
                              end
      ,[EngineOilTemp]     
      ,[EngineCoolantTemp] 
      ,[BatteryVoltage]    
      ,[FuelRate]          
      ,[TotalEngineHours]   
      ,[EngineLoad]         

      ,[EngineSpeed]
      ,[BoostPressure]
      ,[PttTrim]
 
      ,[ActualClutchSlip]
      ,[ControlheadPosition]
      ,[PropellerSpeed]
      ,[RequestClutchSlip]

      ,[GpcState]
      ,[GpcDuty]
      ,[GpcModuleFaults]

      ,[PortCylinderPosition]
      ,[StbdCylinderPosition]

      ,[Latitude]       
      ,[Longitude]     
    
      ,[EngineModel]        = ISNULL(g.EngineModel, v.EngineModel)
      ,[EngineSwVersion]    = ISNULL(g.EngineSwVersion, v.EngineSwVersion)
      ,[EngineFwVersion]    = ISNULL(g.EngineFwVersion,v.EngineFwVersion)
      ,[EngineSerialnumber] = ISNULL(g.EngineSerialnumber, v.EngineSerialnumber)

      ,[TemperatureSource]
      ,[EngineRoomTemp]
      ,[ExhaustGasTemp]
      ,[IntakeManifoldTemp]
      ,[FuelTemp]
      ,[EcuTemp]
      ,[CompressorOutTemp]
      '

      set @create_sql_stmt_2 = '
      ,[GearboxOilPressure]
      ,[GearboxGear]
      ,[GearboxOilTemp]

      ,[FuelUsed]          
      ,[FuelRateAverage]    
      FROM bronze.vw_device v
        JOIN getModel g
              ON v.device = g.device
                  AND (case when v.[EngineOilPressure0] is not null then 1
                            when v.[EngineOilPressure1] is not null then 2
                            when v.[EngineOilPressure2] is not null then 3
                            when v.[EngineOilPressure3] is not null then 4
                            else -1
                            end) = g.EngineInstance
                  AND  v.EngineModel = g.EngineModel
        WHERE   v.device = ''' + @device + '''
            AND v.year   = ''' + @year   + '''
            AND v.month  = ''' + @month  + '''
            AND v.day    = ''' + @day    + ''' 
            AND g.best_row = 1 '

    --select len(@create_sql_stmt + @create_sql_stmt_2)

    --print(@create_sql_stmt + @create_sql_stmt_2)
    --EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt
    EXEC (@create_sql_stmt + @create_sql_stmt_2)

    SET @drop_sql_stmt =
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.device_' + @device + '_' + @year + '_' + @month + '_' + @day  + '_' + @UniqueNumber;

    --print(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt


END;
